cab.content: Military Secret. l?63.8i^rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,V2nd April 1920.'5058. 22n4 April. Malleson wired, 19tli April, that garrison of Kagan, on 29tli March, consisted of 3,000 Bolshevik: infantry, 400 cavalry, 14 guns, GO machine guns. Situation in Bokhara was quiet, though local dislike of Bolsheviks continued.
